//Heading CAMERA CALENDAR CHATBOT PEST INFORMATION
You can access your smartphone camera through Harvest Assistant to identify pests. Organize your planting date and harvest date by setting up your activities in the calendar Interact with the Harvest Assistant\'s chatbot for more grain farming tips "Harvest Assistant provides pest information to combat infestations."
